H0.text: Which tennis player played in three consecutive men's singles finals at Wimbledon between 1963 and 1965, losing on all three occasions. Rod Laver

H1.text: Which tennis player played in three consecutive men's singles finals at Wimbledon between 1963 and 1965, losing on all three occasions. Roy Emerson

H2.text: Which tennis player played in three consecutive men's singles finals at Wimbledon between 1963 and 1965, losing on all three occasions. Ken Rosewall

H3.text: Which tennis player played in three consecutive men's singles finals at Wimbledon between 1963 and 1965, losing on all three occasions. FRED STOLLE

A4.text: Stolle finished as runner-up in these tournaments and losing to compatriot Roy Emerson on no fewer than five occasions.

A5.text: Stolle lost to Roy Emerson on no fewer than five occasions.
